name: Health Harbor
headline: Using generative AI to call insurance for healthcare clinics
description:
We use generative AI to call insurance on behalf of healthcare clinics. We save clinics up to 40 hours of calls every week over existing outsourced human solutions. 

Compared to the existing solutions for benefits verifications: 
- We're faster -- by default, we have a turnaround of 24 hours compared to typically a 3 day turnaround for competitors
- We can reach more payors -- as long as they have a phone line, we can support calling them for benefits. There's quite a few payors in both medical and dental (e.g. Seledent) that have yet to offer a digital retrieval of benefits
- We're reliable and consistent -- there is no person-to-person variation or question skipping when it comes to working with software
tags: industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:healthcare-it; industry:billing; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Alan Liu, CEO/Founder
founders.description: Alan is the CEO and co-founder of Health Harbor. As a technical CEO, He has five years of previous software experience in AI at Meta and Nuro. While building a hearing aid for himself at Yale, his experiences with medical insurance shaped his conviction to improve the billing process for doctors and patients. Outside of Health Harbor, Alan is an aspiring sushi chef.

![](https://healthharbor.co/webflow/images/icon-cross.svg)
##### Nevercall insurance again**.**
Our AI talks to health insurance reps on your behalf, enabling your staff to focus on more complex issues.
[ Book Discovery Call ](https://healthharbor.co/<https:/calendly.com/health-harbor-alan/meeting>)
![Play Video
](https://healthharbor.co/webflow/images/play-button-arrowhead-1.svg)
![Pause Video](https://healthharbor.co/webflow/images/music-pause-button-pair-of-lines.svg)
![](https://healthharbor.co/webflow/images/close-up-smiling-female-entrepreneur-talking-phone-sitting-office-looks-away-1.png)
Any Payor**.** Any Specialty**.** Any Call** _._**
We cover Medical, Dental, Behavioral Health, and Pharmacy.
![](https://healthharbor.co/webflow/images/Benefit.svg)
BenefitVerifications
We check coverage for specific procedure codes and places of service—details often unavailable on the insurer’s website.
![](https://healthharbor.co/webflow/images/Prior-Auth.svg)
PriorAuthorizations
We ask for the requirements for prior auths, submit prior auths via the phone, and follow up on the status of prior auths.
![](https://healthharbor.co/webflow/images/Claim-Status.svg)
ClaimFollow-Up
We ask for the current status (not found, pending, paid, or denied), and can follow up on why the claim was denied.
![](https://healthharbor.co/webflow/images/Benefit.svg)
BenefitVerifications
We check if a patient’s plan is active, deductibles/maximums, and coverage for specific procedure codes—details often unavailable on the insurer’s website.
![](https://healthharbor.co/webflow/images/Prior-Auth.svg)
PriorAuthorizations
We can check the status of a prior authorization inquiry, including the date it was submitted, the date it was approved, how long it lasts and the number of visits approved.
![](https://healthharbor.co/webflow/images/Claim-Status.svg)
ClaimStatus
We handle your AR follow up so you can understand why a claim shows no activity or is denied. Your team can then focus on fixing or adjusting the claim to recover payments left on the table.
Automation Options
AI Agent
Our AI speaks to live reps for benefits verifications, prior auth, and claims status.
AI Copilot
Our AI will navigate IVR, wait on hold and then transfer to your staff to complete the call. Even waiting on hold can save your staff from 15 minutes to an hour, especially if they’re calling BCBS.
![](https://healthharbor.co/webflow/images/66a985dd3fc9c9e1d18ac364_photo-landscape-03.webp-p-800.webp.svg)
Affordable**.** Accurate**.** Scalable**.**
![](https://healthharbor.co/webflow/images/Lower.svg)
>50%
More affordable than outsourcing to call centers.
![](https://healthharbor.co/webflow/images/Accuracy.svg)
90%
Accuracy of our fully automated results.
![](https://healthharbor.co/webflow/images/Scale.svg)
3k+
Fully automated calls daily.
Who We Call
Our API currently supports major insurers covering ~50% of US plans. We're expanding coverage monthly.
![](https://healthharbor.co/webflow/images/Image-3.svg)
![](https://healthharbor.co/webflow/images/Image-1.svg)
Verifying Results
We offer multiple verification data-points such as the representative's name, reference number, call end time, transcript, and call recordings.
Completion Time
Requests typically return results in 1 day, with a 2 business day SLA. Urgent requests return results on the same day if submitted by noon ET.
![](https://healthharbor.co/webflow/images/Image-2.svg)
### How the AI Agent Works
Our AI first navigates the insurance’s automated system or IVR, then waits on hold, and finally speaks directly with a live agent.We handle the entire call and return results via our API or web portal.
![](https://healthharbor.co/webflow/images/HIW-1.svg)
![](https://healthharbor.co/webflow/images/Overlay-1.svg)
#### Submit
Submit a benefits verification request via our web portal or API.
![](https://healthharbor.co/webflow/images/HIW-2.svg)
![](https://healthharbor.co/webflow/images/Overlay-2.svg)
#### First Call
Our AI kicks off a call, navigating IVR trees, waiting on hold, and speaking with a representative.
![](https://healthharbor.co/webflow/images/HIW-4.svg)
![](https://healthharbor.co/webflow/images/Overlay-3.svg)
#### Vaildation
We normalize the data based off of the audio and transcripts, then we compare to historical results to identify outliers. If there are inconsistencies, then we kick off another call.
![](https://healthharbor.co/webflow/images/HIW-5.svg)
![](https://healthharbor.co/webflow/images/Overlay-4.svg)
#### View Results
Once we are confident in the results, we notify you via web hook or display results on our web portal.
What Our Customers Love
![](https://healthharbor.co/webflow/images/image-2.png)
“The **speed** and **accuracy** of the results enable our patients to make **informed decisions**.”
Director of Clinical Operations, Kivo Health
Pulmonary Rehab
![](https://healthharbor.co/webflow/images/image-3-9.png)
“Health Harbor’s **seamless** eligibility verifications enable us to **focus on patient care**.”
Co-founder & CEO, Flair Health
Chronic Care Management
![](https://healthharbor.co/webflow/images/Frame-48096235.png)
![](https://healthharbor.co/webflow/images/Simplification.svg)
Never Call Insurance Again**.**

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Health Harbor**

Health Harbor is a forward-thinking startup founded in 2023 and based in San Francisco. Currently part of Y Combinator’s Summer 2023 batch, the company aims to revolutionize the healthcare industry through innovative use of generative AI. They focus specifically on alleviating one of the most tedious processes in healthcare administration: dealing with insurance verification calls. 

**Mission**

Their mission is straightforward yet impactful: *Using generative AI to handle insurance calls for healthcare clinics,* effectively saving these clinics up to 40 hours weekly compared to traditional outsourcing methods.

**Key Benefits** 

Health Harbor is not just faster; it’s a whole lot more efficient. Here’s how they stack up against the competition:

1. **Speed**: They offer a turnaround time of 24 hours for benefit verifications, as opposed to the typical 3-day wait from other providers.
2. **Coverage**: Their AI can call any payor with a phone line, including many that still don't have digital options for retrieving benefits information.
3. **Reliability**: Unlike human operators, their AI ensures consistency, eliminating the variability that comes with different human interactions.

**Service Offerings**

Health Harbor specializes in three key services:
- **Benefit Verifications**: They check patient coverage for specific procedures and services—often the information is not clear on insurers’ websites.
- **Prior Authorizations**: They assist in navigating prior auth requirements, submitting requests, and follow-ups.
- **Claim Follow-Up**: They track the status of claims, including why a claim might have been denied.

With their AI capabilities, clinics can expect automated calls to handle these tasks, which helps staff focus on higher-value activities.

**Key Metrics and Market Position**

- They’re reported to be **over 50% cheaper** than traditional call center outsourcing.
- **90% accuracy** in fully automated results, thanks to advanced AI systems.
- They can handle **3,000+ automated calls daily**, expanding their coverage and capabilities continuously.

**Team and Support**

The company operates with a compact team of four, led by their group partner, Nan. This lean structure allows them to remain agile while developing their cutting-edge technology.

**User Experience**

Health Harbor provides a smooth experience for clinics, returning verification results quickly (typically within a day) and providing comprehensive follow-up data, including transcripts and recordings of calls.

**Conclusion**

In a world where healthcare providers are often bogged down by administrative tasks, Health Harbor stands out as a beacon of innovation. Their generative AI not only enhances efficiency but also empowers healthcare teams to devote their precious time to what truly matters: patient care. 

If you're looking to optimize insurance call processes and boost operational efficiency in healthcare, Health Harbor comes highly recommended. Visit their website at [Health Harbor](https://healthharbor.co/) for more information and to book a discovery call.
